title: CLI tool to add two numbers
description: A command-line interface (CLI) tool that takes two numbers as input and outputs their sum.
acceptance_criteria: The tool should accept two numbers as input.
The tool should output the sum of the two numbers.
The tool should handle invalid input gracefully (e.g., non-numeric input).
tests_to_run: Test with invalid inputs (e.g., non-numeric input, empty input).
